【Shortcut key of bank hotline】How to contact CS directly?
AGNES.TO
Last Updated 29 November, 2021
It is a painful process whenever you dial a bank hotline, which takes you several minutes to transfer the call to the customer service. Therefore, MoneyHero has prepared a hotline masterpiece for you! We listed all the contact numbers of major banks, and the shortcut keys that help you contact the customer service officer directly or other bank services, such as report lost credit cards, request annual fee waiver, etc.
DBS
Credit card customer service︰2290 8888 Customer Service Shortcut key︰3 > 1 > 8 > ＃
Request annual fee waiver Shortcut key︰3 > 1 > 1
Report credit card lost Shortcut key︰3 > 1 > ＃ > 1
BEA
Credit card customer service︰3608 6628 Customer Service Shortcut key︰2 > 3 > ＊ > 8
Request annual fee waiver Shortcut key︰2 > 3 > ＊ > 3 > 1
Report credit card lost Shortcut key︰2 > 6
HSBC
Credit card customer service︰2233 3000 Customer Service Shortcut key︰2 > 3 > ＃ > 0
Request annual fee waiver Nil, contact CS directly
Report credit card lost Shortcut key︰2 > 3 > ＊> 1
Citibank
Credit card customer service︰2860 0333 Customer Service Shortcut key︰2 > ＊2＃ > 0
Request annual fee waiver Nil, contact CS directly
Report credit card lost Shortcut key︰2 > ＊1＃ > 1

Report credit card lost︰2811 6122 Report credit card lost Shortcut key︰2
